hero.headline: Fighting Cancer Together
hero.subtext: Join BANcat in our mission to support cancer patients with hope, care, and financial aid.

volunteer.title: Become a Volunteer
volunteer.intro: Join BANCAT as a volunteer and contribute to the global fight against cancer. By signing up, you will participate in diverse initiatives designed to provide critical care to patients throughout every stage of their treatment. Your involvement will also play a vital role in raising public awareness and fostering collaboration among organizations dedicated to this cause. Seize this opportunity to make a lasting impact and improve the lives of millions of cancer patients in Bangladesh and beyond.
volunteer.terms_title: By registering as a volunteer with BANCAT, the applicant agrees to adhere to the following terms and conditions:

terms.values_desc: The volunteer must strictly adhere to the core principles, mission, and ethical standards of BANCAT.
terms.commitment_desc: The applicant affirms a genuine interest in service-oriented initiatives and a commitment to advancing the organizationâ€™s humanitarian goals.
terms.probono_desc: All volunteer services are performed voluntarily. The applicant acknowledges that they shall receive no salary, wages, or financial remuneration of any kind in exchange for their services.
terms.integrity_desc: The volunteer is expected to maintain the highest standards of integrity and trustworthiness. This includes the responsible management of resources and the faithful execution of assigned duties during project implementation.
